Package com.practice.practice.service.implementation

Class ProfessorServiceImplementation

java.lang.Object
com.practice.practice.service.implementation.ProfessorServiceImplementation
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProfessorService
@Service public class ProfessorServiceImplementation extends Object implements ProfessorService
Implementación de la interfaz CourseService que proporciona lógica de negocio para los profesores.
